title: Requires board of elections to provide voter identification cards
summary: Requires board of elections to provide voter registration identification cards; mandates that citizens shall not be permitted to vote unless such identification card is presented.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2868

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Election Law

       AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the board of  elections
         providing voter identification cards

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 5-214 of the election law, as amended by chapter  9
    2  of the laws of 1978, is amended to read as follows:
    3    S  5-214. Registration cards for identification.  A board of elections
    4  [may] SHALL provide identification cards for use in any city [or],  town
    5  OR  VILLAGE  in  such  county  in  which the board deems it necessary to
    6  facilitate voting. However, the failure of a voter to present such  card
    7  shall  not deprive such voter of the right to exercise the franchise, or
    8  any other right provided under this chapter; HOWEVER, FAILURE TO PRODUCE
    9  SUCH CARD SHALL REQUIRE EXERCISING THE FRANCHISE BY USE OF PAPER  BALLOT
   10  UNTIL THE VALIDITY OF VOTER REGISTRATION IS CONFIRMED.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02837-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the board of elections providing voter identification cards
